CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL( Source_de_contact__c,"RPPS") , IMAGE("/resource/1551199623000/ICONS_CONTACT_RPPS", "RPPS", 40 ,65 ) , IF ( ISPICKVAL( Source_de_contact__c,"Site Internet") , IMAGE("/resource/1551199653000/ICONS_CONTACT_Internet", "Site Internet", 40 ,40 ) , IF ( ISPICKVAL( Source_de_contact__c,"Appel entrant") , IMAGE("/resource/1551199676000/ICONS_CONTACT_Appel", "Appel entrant", 40 ,40 ) , IF ( ISPICKVAL( Source_de_contact__c,"Evenements Cerba HealthCare") , IMAGE("/resource/1551199709000/ICONS_CONTACT_Event_Cerba", "Evénements Cerba HealthCare", 40 ,40 ) , IF ( ISPICKVAL( Source_de_contact__c,"Congres salons") , IMAGE("/resource/1551199754000/ICONS_CONTACT_Salons_Congres", "Congrès salons", 40 ,40 ) , IF ( ISPICKVAL( Source_de_contact__c,"SGLs") , IMAGE("/resource/1551199779000/ICONS_CONTACT_SGL", "SGLs", 40 ,80 ) , IF ( ISPICKVAL(Source_de_contact__c, "LinkedIn") , IMAGE("/resource/1551199806000/ICONS_CONTACT_Linkedin", "LinkedIn", 40 ,40) , IF ( ISPICKVAL(Source_de_contact__c, "Prospection personnelle") , IMAGE("/resource/1551199829000/ICONS_CONTACT_Prospection", "Prospection personnelle", 40, 40) , IF (Source_de_donnees__c ='RPPS' , IMAGE("/resource/1551199623000/ICONS_CONTACT_RPPS", "RPPS", 40 ,65 ) , "" ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
